name: 張元震
objective:
讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等，可重覆修習。
Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.
schedule:
1. Introduction & Course Requirements (1 weeks)
2. Lectures & Seminars by Invited Speakers (10 weeks)
3. Research Presentations by Selected Senior Ph.D. Students
scorePolicy:
1. Attendance and Participation in Discussion (50%)
2. Seminar Summary Reports (50%)
consultation: 教師時間，提供個別輔導
